type.name: T:Elysium.Converters.IsGreaterThanConverter
type.summary: Calculates if one number is bigger than another one.

method.name: M:Elysium.Converters.IsGreaterThanConverter.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
method.summary: Calculates if one number is bigger than another one with double precision.
method.param: A number, which is one of the following types: , , , , , , ."
A target type. The value is ignored.
A parameter of the converter. A second number for comparing. Has to be a string and represent a number, which can be converted to the type
Language and local parameters used in converter. The value is ignored.
method.returns: True, if is bigger, than , false otherwise. If there is a failure during method execution, following value will be returned DependencyProperty.UnsetValue.
